headline.main: NYC Businessman Gets Two-Year Sentence for Spousal Abuse, Gun Use
headline.print_headline: NYC Businessman Gets Two-Year Sentence for Spousal Abuse, Gun Use

docs.snippet: A wealthy New York City textile entrepreneur was sentenced to two years in prison on Wednesday for assaulting his much younger ex-wife and carrying a handgun registered to a police officer friend....
docs.lead_paragraph: A wealthy New York City textile entrepreneur was sentenced to two years in prison on Wednesday for assaulting his much younger ex-wife and carrying a handgun registered to a police officer friend.

headline.main: Illinois Governor Vetoes Budget Bills, Citing $4 Billion Deficit
headline.print_headline: Illinois Governor Vetoes Budget Bills, Citing $4 Billion Deficit

docs.snippet: Illinois Governor Bruce Rauner on Thursday vetoed 19 budget bills that he said would create a nearly $4 billion deficit for the financially troubled state....
docs.lead_paragraph: Illinois Governor Bruce Rauner on Thursday vetoed 19 budget bills that he said would create a nearly $4 billion deficit for the financially troubled state.

headline.main: At the Spring 2016 Men’s Wear Shows, Grommets Are the Embellishment of Choice

docs.snippet: This season, the metal-edged cut-outs usually reserved for ventilation have popped up as a graphic adornment at Alexander McQueen, Prada and Raf Simons....
docs.abstract: This season, the metal-edged cut-outs usually reserved for ventilation have popped up as a graphic adornment at Alexander McQueen, Prada and Raf Simons.

headline.main: House GOP Revokes Punishment for Lawmaker Who Defied Leaders
headline.print_headline: House GOP Revokes Punishment for Lawmaker Who Defied Leaders

docs.snippet: House Republican leaders handed a subcommittee gavel back to a defiant colleague Thursday days after revoking it in an act of party discipline....
docs.lead_paragraph: House Republican leaders handed a subcommittee gavel back to a defiant colleague Thursday days after revoking it in an act of party discipline.

headline.main: Key Senator Blasts Personnel Management Office Chief Over Hack
headline.print_headline: Key Senator Blasts Personnel Management Office Chief Over Hack

docs.snippet: The chairman of the Senate Homeland Security Committee said on Thursday the director of the Office of Personnel Management should not be allowed to stay in place to deal with the aftermath of a data breach by suspected Chinese hackers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Senate Homeland Security Committee said on Thursday the director of the Office of Personnel Management should not be allowed to stay in place to deal with the aftermath of a data breach by suspected Chinese hackers.

headline.main: NATO to Assess Afghan Fighting Season Before Deciding on Mission's Future
headline.print_headline: NATO to Assess Afghan Fighting Season Before Deciding on Mission's Future

docs.snippet: NATO will decide how quickly to scale back its mission to train Afghan security forces after judging how well they perform in this summer's "fighting season", the alliance's chief said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: NATO will decide how quickly to scale back its mission to train Afghan security forces after judging how well they perform in this summer's "fighting season", the alliance's chief said on Thursday.

headline.main: Michelle Obama to Open 2015 Special Olympics in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama to Open 2015 Special Olympics in Los Angeles

docs.snippet: First lady Michelle Obama will travel to Los Angeles next month to kick off the Special Olympics World Games, organizers announced Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: First lady Michelle Obama will travel to Los Angeles next month to kick off the Special Olympics World Games, organizers announced Thursday.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Ted 2,’ the Foulmouthed Bear Tries to Prove He’s Human
headline.print_headline: Legal Offensive of a Lewd Bear

docs.snippet: In a quest to be a husband and father, the character voiced by Seth MacFarlane aligns his struggle with that of enslaved black Americans....
docs.abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie Ted 2, directed by and starring Seth MacFarlane.
docs.lead_paragraph: In a quest to be a husband and father, the character voiced by Seth MacFarlane aligns his struggle with that of enslaved black Americans.

headline.main: Patrick Macnee, Star of 1960s TV Series 'The Avengers,' Dies
headline.print_headline: Patrick Macnee, Star of 1960s TV Series 'The Avengers,' Dies

docs.snippet: Patrick Macnee, the British-born actor best known as dapper secret agent John Steed in the long-running 1960s TV series "The Avengers," has died. He was 93....
docs.lead_paragraph: Patrick Macnee, the British-born actor best known as dapper secret agent John Steed in the long-running 1960s TV series "The Avengers," has died. He was 93.

headline.main: EU Warns Britain That Its Fundamental Values 'Not for Sale'
headline.print_headline: EU Warns Britain That Its Fundamental Values 'Not for Sale'

docs.snippet: The European Union's president warned Britain on Thursday he's open to suggestions on how the bloc must change, but won't compromise on the EU's "fundamental values."...
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union's president warned Britain on Thursday he's open to suggestions on how the bloc must change, but won't compromise on the EU's "fundamental values."
